recipe.ingredients: - chia seeds: 1/4 cup - unsweetened almond milk: 1 cup - vanilla extract: 1 teaspoon - maple syrup: 1 tablespoon - mixed berries (blueberries, raspberries, strawberries): 1/2 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Mix Chia Seeds: In a bowl, combine the chia seeds, almond milk, vanilla extract, and maple syrup. Stir well to mix everything evenly. 2. Refrigerate: Cover the bowl with a lid or plastic wrap. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours, preferably overnight, to allow the chia seeds to swell and the pudding to thicken. 3. Serve with Berries: Once the pudding has set, give it a good stir to break any clumps. Serve the pudding in bowls and top with fresh mixed berries.
